item.title: One Year Anniversary
item.description: Hello! It’s been an exact year since the first post on this blog! Time really goes by, I had plans to update this blog but got busy apparently. A lot has happened in this year, I got a new job, in a new city! I’m not one for traveling often, so I always appreciate a change of scenery :) I also got really interested in quantum physics and string theory, but turns out I need to learn a lot of complex analysis, so I’ll hopefully try to get to that.
item.content:
Hello! It’s been an exact year since the first post on this blog! Time really goes by, I had plans to update this blog but got busy apparently. A lot has happened in this year, I got a new job, in a new city! I’m not one for traveling often, so I always appreciate a change of scenery :) I also got really interested in quantum physics and string theory, but turns out I need to learn a lot of complex analysis, so I’ll hopefully try to get to that.

I like to end this post with another promise to update this website and add more stuff on the projects and the work I’ve done.

Take care ðŸ‘‹

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is the first post, just trying this out, hopefully I write more stuff, stay tuned!
item.content: This is the first post, just trying this out, hopefully I write more stuff, stay tuned!
